author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28033 for 10_2_X. 
This is a minimal fix without the code simplification in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28033.
title: [10_2_X] Fix a discrepancy in Puppi weights when running on MiniAOD w/ useExistingWeights=False
